title: American Anthropologist

see-also.note: Memoirs of the American Anthropological Association

additional-note: While we did not find any active renewals specifically mentioning American Anthropologist, there is a 1981 renewal for 'Studies in Chinese Thought', one of the Memoirs of the American Anthropological Association that was published as vol. 55, no. 5, part 2 of American Anthropologist in 1953. Later Memoirs that appeared in American Anthropologist might also be renewed under their distinctive titles.
